tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysis (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    analyzed_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE FeedbackAnalysis (
    AnalysisID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    FeedbackID INT,
    AnalysisDate DATE,
    SentimentScore FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_feedback FOREIGN KEY (FeedbackID) REFERENCES SentimentAnalysisData(ID)
);

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
    ResultID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    AnalysisID INT,
    PositiveFeedbackCount INT,
    NegativeFeedbackCount INT,
    NeutralFeedbackCount INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_analysis FOREIGN KEY (AnalysisID) REFERENCES FeedbackAnalysis(AnalysisID)
);
